metadata.title: The Cavern of Trials
metadata.description: A three-tier behavior demonstration with puzzle mechanics.
metadata.author: Layered Game Example

locations.name: Cavern Entrance
locations.description: You stand at the entrance to an ancient cavern system. The air is cool and damp. Passages lead north to a grotto, east to a stalactite cavern, south to a reflection chamber, west to a shrine, and down to an idol chamber.

north.name: passage
north.description: A dark passage leads north, with a faint greenish glow visible in the distance.

east.name: tunnel
east.description: An echoing tunnel extends to the east.

south.name: corridor
south.description: A smooth corridor leads south, where you hear the sound of dripping water.

west.name: archway
west.description: An ornate archway opens to the west.

locations.name: Mushroom Grotto
locations.description: A cavern filled with bioluminescent mushrooms. Some glow dimly, others are dark. A bucket of water sits near the entrance. Strange symbols are carved into the ceiling, but it's too dark to read them clearly.

south.name: passage
south.description: The passage leads back south to the entrance.

locations.name: Singing Stalactites Cavern
locations.description: Massive stalactites hang from the ceiling, each a different size. A musical score is carved into the wall showing five notes. Crystal shards are visible embedded high in the ceiling.

locations.name: Well of Reflections
locations.description: A circular chamber with a deep well at its center. The water glows with an eerie light. Looking into the well, you see... yourself. But something feels different each time you look.

locations.name: Household Shrine
locations.description: A small shrine room with a stone altar. Incense burners line the walls. The air feels sacred and still.

locations.name: Weighted Idol Chamber
locations.description: A square chamber with a pedestal in the center holding a golden idol. Pressure plates surround the pedestal. A sealed door is set into the north wall.

north.name: sealed door
north.description: A heavy sealed door with pressure-sensitive mechanisms.

locations.name: Treasure Chamber
locations.description: You've successfully navigated the trials! Ancient treasures glitter in the torchlight.

south.name: door
south.description: The door back to the idol chamber.

player.name: Mordecai
player.description: A crusty old puzzle enthusiast who's seen more trick locks and hidden mechanisms than most people have seen sunrises. Spent decades solving puzzles, from simple sliding blocks to elaborate multi-room contraptions. Unimpressed by cheap gimmicks and theatrical nonsense. Heard about this place and came hoping for something that might actually present a challenge. Cautiously optimistic but prepared to be disappointed.
